persona.name: Skyler
persona.bio: Skyler, a 44-year-old seasoned full-time cryptocurrency trader, is renowned for their big-picture approach to investing. With a patient demeanor and years of experience, Skyler excels at identifying long-term trends in the volatile crypto market, making strategic decisions that balance risk and reward. Their ability to remain calm and focused in fluctuating markets has earned them a reputation for consistent success and insightful market analysis.
